Hae tähän rooliin lataamalla hakemuksesi hakujärjestelmäämme klikkaamalla Apply-painiketta.Hakulomakkeemme on nopea ja helppo täyttää: lisää vain yhteystietosi ja lataa liitteeksi hakudokumenttisi. Hakudokumenteiksi toivomme CV:tä ja hakemuskirjettä, jossa kuulemme mielellämme lisää sinusta, urastasi, kiinnostuksen kohteistasi ja miksi kiinnostuit tästä roolista Futuricella! Voit halutessasi myös lisätä mukaan linkin LinkedIn-profiiliisi ja jakaa muita tärkeäksi katsomiasi liitteitä.Käsittelemme hakemuksia saapumisjärjestyksessä. Rekrytointiprosessiimme kuuluu useampi haastattelu, jotka voidaan pitää etänä tai toimistollamme Helsingin keskustassa. Ensimmäisessä haastattelussa tarkoituksena on tutustua, keskustella kokemuksestasi, osaamisestasi ja kiinnostuksen kohteistasi ja kertoa lisää meidän roolista ja arjesta Futuricella. Toisessa haastattelussa sukellamme vielä syvemmälle ammatilliseen osaamiseesi ja kokemukseesi, ja rekrytointiprosessin loppuvaiheessa keskustelemme lisää mahdollisista projekteista, joihin uusi tiimikaveri voisi hypätä! Tarkoituksena on, että läpi rekrytointiprosessin pääset tutustumaan useampaan tulevaan kollegaan ja saat monipuolisen käsityksen roolista, vastuistasi, odotuksista ja siitä, millainen työarki sinua mahdollisesti odottaa Futuricella!Mikäli sinulla on kysymyksiä rooliin liittyen, voit olla yhteydessärecruitment@futurice.comPalkkauksestaPalkkaukseen liittyvät yksityiskohdat käydään läpi yksityiskohtaisesti rekrytointiprosessin aikana. Palkkaviitekehyksemme on suunniteltu tarjoamaan erilaisia uratasoja, jotka perustuvat kolmeen tekijään: taidot, vastuut ja roolin vaikuttavuus. Olemme omistautuneet luomaan yhdenvertaisen ja tukevan työympäristön, jossa jokaisella työntekijällä on mahdollisuus menestyä ja edetä urallaan sekä tulla paremmiksi versioiksi itsestään.Ensimmäisellä haastattelukierroksella keskustelemme tämän tehtävän palkkahaarukasta. Tarjoamme kiinteää palkkaa, johon sisältyy mahdollisuus suoritusperusteisiin bonuksiin ja lisäetuihin.Olemme Futurice, tuloksiin keskittynyt digitaalisen muutoksen tekijä.Autamme asiakkaitamme ratkaisemaan merkittävimmät ongelmansa ja löytämään tapoja vaikuttaa maailmaan positiivisesti. Meillä on uniikki organisaatiokulttuuri ja vahvat arvot: luottamus, läpinäkyvyys, välittäminen ja jatkuva kehittyminen. Yhteisömme on loistava alusta kehittymiselle ja tarjoamme kattavat oppimis- ja kouluttautumismahdollisuudet, mahdollistaen ammatillisen ja henkilökohtaisen kasvun kaikille. Toimintaamme ohjaa selkeät monimuotoisuustavoitteet ja eettiset toimintaperiaatteet. Meillä saat inspiraatiota erilaisista näkökulmista: jokainen futuricelainen yksilöllisellä tarinallaan tuo oman jälkensä monimuotoiseen kulttuuriimme.Vuonna 2000 perustetussa yrityksessämme työskentelee noin 800 monipuolisista taustoista ponnistavaa asiantuntijaa yli 60:stä eri maasta. Juuremme ovat Pohjoismaissa, asenteemme globaali ja toimimme ympäri Eurooppaa.

title: Open Application For Data Ai Sssii
description: MAKE YOUR STORY REALSiili is at the forefront of AI-powered development, and we are always looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you are passionate about data and AI, we want to hear from you! Whether you are a Data Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer, Data Scientist, or have expertise in other related fields, we welcome open applications for our Data & AI roles.Why Siili? 🦔At Siili, you will collaborate with AI-assisted developers and designers on projects that go beyond proof-of-concept, delivering real-world impact and innovation. Our own AI transformation uniquely positions us as the ideal partner to guide our clients through their AI journeys. We are currently supporting leading organizations like Microsoft and Yle in their AI transformations. AI represents the next industrial revolution, and Siili is ready to lead the charge in digital development, making the most of the transformative power of AI.What We Offer🤝Interesting and Impactful Work:You will work on exciting client projects that make a real difference. From building scalable data pipelines and implementing machine learning solutions to solving real-life business challenges with modern data solutions, your work will have a significant impact.Growth Ecosystem:At Siili, we believe in continuous growth. You can always deepen your expertise alongside our Data & AI experts. We offer various tracks for skill development.Flexible Working Environment:Our ways of working are tailored around you, allowing for flexibility to fit each individual's life situation. You will work in diverse teams while still managing your own work - we trust you!Collaborative & Inclusive Culture:You will have the opportunity to work with the best colleagues (Siilis) on interesting client projects. We value diversity and strive to create an inclusive work environment.What Are We Looking For?🎯We are interested in professionals with experience in various Data & AI roles, including but not limited to:Data Engineers:hands-on coding experience with data-intensive solutions, experience with cloud platforms, and knowledge of data modelling methods.Machine Learning Engineers:Strong data science and machine learning expertise, Python programming skills, experience with cloud-based development, and proficiency in Finnish.Data Scientists:Advanced analytical skills, experience with machine learning libraries, and a strong understanding of data science methodologies.Shall We Get to Know Each Other Better?💬At Siili, we don't have interviews, we have meetings. With two meetings, we ensure together that both our goals and expectations are aligned, laying the foundation for a great future together.We hope to receive applications from individuals with various backgrounds, including different ages, genders, and cultural or minority groups. Please let us know if we can adjust our meeting according to your needs. We aim to consider individual needs and neurodiversity in our recruitment process, and to make meetings as comfortable as possible for everyone.WE MAKE IT REAL

title: Machine Learning Engineer Sssii
description: MAKE YOUR STORY REALSiili is at the forefront of AI-powered development. Here, you will collaborate with AI-assisted developers and designers on projects that go beyond proof-of-concept, delivering real-world impact and innovation.Our own AI transformation uniquely positions us as the ideal partner to guide our clients through their AI journeys. We are currently supporting leading organizations like Microsoft and Yle in their AI transformations.AI represents the next industrial revolution, and Siili is ready to lead the charge in digital development, making the most of the transformative power of AI.Read more about our projects here.Interested in becoming a Machine Learning Engineer at Siili?🦔As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will work together with our Data Engineers and Data Scientists of the Data Science Tribe to help our wide range of customers in taking their AI-capabilities to the next level. Your role will be a combination of building good data flow between different systems and implementing machine learning solutions and pipelines utilizing cloud-based or open-source machine learning stacks. You will become an expert in deploying machine learning solutions and in all that follows: we call this machine learning operations or in other words MLOps.To succeed in this role, you should have:🎯At least one year (preferably 2+) of experience working as a cloud developer, data engineer, ML engineer or data scientist in a product company or as a consultantStrong knowledge of data science and machine learning conceptsGood Python skills and knowledge of Python machine learning libraries, like: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, PandasExperience of cloud-based development (AWS, Google Cloud or Azure)SQL skillsKnowledge of development tools like Git, Docker, and VS CodeFluent Finnish skillsAdditionally, it is beneficial if you have:Experience in deploying machine learning systems into productionExperience with A/B testingExperience with databases, data warehouses, and ETL/ELT processesKnowledge of Spark, DatabricksFamiliarity with DevOps, MLOps, CI/CDKnowledge of Generative AI toolsWhyto ChooseSiili?🤝Siili is a partner in design, data, and AI-driven software development, specializing in recommendation engines and personalization solutions for digital business clients in media, retail, gaming, and entertainment. We optimize customer data through conversion optimization, customer segmentation, A/B testing, predictive models, and time series analysis. Our Data Scientists and ML Engineers tackle challenges across industries like healthcare, energy, manufacturing, insurance, banking, and maritime, using techniques such as computer vision, NLP, deep learning, optimization, and Bayesian modeling. As an ML Engineer, you are a key part of Siili's core team.We provide a culture and environment withJoy, AmbitionandHumanetouch. This means that we continuously organize different kinds of activities and gatherings, strive to enable exciting projects with learning opportunities, and continuously work on creating a work environment that is inclusive and psychologically safe for everyone to express themselves.You will have the opportunity to work with the best colleagues (Siilis) on interesting client projects. You will never be bored:we believe in continuous growth, meaning you can always deepen your expertise alongside our Data Science experts. Being a Siili means you get to work in diverse teams while still managing your own work - we trust you!A variety ofgreat fringe benefits; such as extensive healthcare, flexible working hours, snacks, inhouse coach, SiiliX Share program, employee bike benefit, and company-sponsored massage.Discover more about our benefits here , and get to know our team through these inspiring career stories . For a closer look at our vibrant company culture, we also recommend following us on Instagram .Shall we get to know each other better?💬At Siili, we don't have interviews, we have meetings. With two meetings, we ensure together that both our goals and expectations are aligned, laying the foundation for a great future together.We hope to receive applications from individuals with various backgrounds, including different ages, genders, and cultural or minority groups. Please let us know if we can adjust our meeting according to your needs. We aim to consider individual needs and neurodiversity in our recruitment process, and to make meetings as comfortable as possible for everyone.WE MAKE IT REAL

title: Backend Engineer Scala Partner Tech Scsom
description: Zalando together with partners fulfill more than 200 million orders every year and the volumes are increasing. Whenever a customer places an order, technology is at the scene and behind the scenes - software makes our systems work.As aBackend Engineerin Zalando Partner Tech, you will get to build this software and innovate, optimize and automate how our systems work on a massive scale. You will be responsible for developing and operating in production backend microservices using Scala, AWS, Kubernetes and we will support you to grow and work with exciting modern technologies.INCLUSIVE BY DESIGNAt Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy: https://corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategyOur employee resource groups: https://corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groupsWHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDEDPartner Tech provides a technical ecosystem where partners can connect to and sell at Zalando. Our team builds and operates a subset in this domain building business-critical services which partners use to fulfill orders placed by Zalando customers.Build and operate an ecosystem where our partners can use our tools, services and APIs to handle orders placed by Zalando customersTogether with your team, you will own your code and decide on the technologies and methods to deliver, as well as operate large-scale applications Cloud PlatformsActively participate in each stage of the development cycle as part of a strong engineering team - from solution design to implementation, testing, monitoring and operating your code in a production environment.Perform code reviews, share knowledge and provide constructive feedback to team members.Actively participate in team discussions, design decisions and requirements clarifications with stakeholders and product managersYou keep learning and share your knowledge of state-of-the-art technologies that will help us innovate fasterWHAT WE'RE LOOKING FORSolid command of Scala and knowledge of software patterns and paradigms like continuous integration, test automation and deployment pipelines.Experience in specifying, planning, developing, maintaining and operating microservices using REST API (OpenAPI), Cloud Platforms (AWS, Kubernetes), PostgreSQL.Experience or interest in Java, Kotlin, web frontend technologies (React, Vue, Micro Frontend Architecture) is a plus.High level knowledge or interest in data engineering and familiarity with DAGs, data pipelines, S3, Superset, Databricks, or Airflow is a plus.You have good communication and collaboration skills and enjoy working in an international and diverse environment with a positive no-job-is-beneath you attitude as a team playerYou are self-motivated and have a proactive mindset with a passion for continuous improvement.You have problem-solving skills and ability to apply logical and analytical thinking to complex problemsIf you think you have what it takes, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet every single requirement. You may just be the right candidate for this or other roles.OUR OFFERCulture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback with internal guilds and Employee Resource Groups, knowledge sharing through tech talks and open source commitment, internal tech academy and blogs, product demos, meetups, parties and events.Competitive salary and employee shares program.40% Zalando discount of products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge and additional discounts from external partnersMonthly transport, lunch and recreation vouchers, private health insurance and occupational health care services, family services, free beverages and snacks, diverse sports and health offeringsCentrally located office in Kamppi, Helsinki, with flexible working times, additional holidays and hybrid working modelExtensive onboarding, mentoring and training opportunities and an international team of experts to work withRelocation assistance for internationalsLearn all about Zalando and our values here: https://jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh_src=22377bdd1us. For more information about our office and teams in Helsinki, please visit: https://www.zalandohelsinki.com/Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

title: Data Scientist Snsit
description: BrieflyPositionFull Stack Data ScientistLocationHelsinki or TampereSkillsMachine learning, data engineering, data repositories, computing environments, cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, GCP), databases, software engineering (e.g. Python, R)KuvausAre you passionate about data and machine learning? Do you want to build solutions that create actual business value? At Nitor, we help our clients to succeed with data.🧑‍🚀Your future roleAs a full stack Data Scientist, you will be creating business value to our customers by helping them to make better business decisions based on data. Your tasks will require both strong data engineering and data science skills.Communication with the customer is crucial. For example, you understand when the problems are better to solve with machine learning and when it’s not, and you will be communicating these decisions efficiently. Training our customer’s experts to use and maintain the provided solution is also part of your job.From a technology point of view, different data repositories, computing environments and data handling tools are part of your daily tools. Cloud services like AWS and Azure and programming languages like Python or R are also important in the full stack Data Scientist role.Our customer projectsare typically challenging yet professionally rewarding. The projects provide an experienced Data Scientist with the possibility to widely utilize and deepen their skill set. The duration of the projects usually ranges between one year and multiple years, depending on your preferences. Our data business unit Nitor Insight, established in 2018, is a tight-knit and startup-like community with an exceptionally high level of data know-how.✅ What makes you successful as a Full Stack Data Scientist at Nitor?Previous work experience in data science. Consulting experience is a bonus but not a strict requirement.A few years of hands-on experience in data engineering, allowing you to work in your customer projects as a value-adding expertBased on your previous experience, you are familiar with the most of the following: machine learning, data repositories, computing environments, cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, GCP), databases, programming, software engineering (e.g. Python, R)You possess a consultative and customer-centric mindsetYou are also willing to work as a data engineer, when neededProfessional proficiency in Finnish is considered an advantageMost importantly: you are passionate about data science, and you actively follow the newest developments in the industry🏆 Why should you choose Nitor?A set of benefits that makes a differenceIn addition to meaningful projects and customized possibilities for professional development, we offer you a profound set of employee benefits. Nitor is built in a way that it can support your career development, sustainable work pace, and well-being.Here are some examples of our employee benefits:You can use 10% of your work time for your professional development however you choose, and your employer will support it.Would you like to participate in an exciting event in your field? You can use up to five workdays a year for training or conference trips anywhere in the world.You will have your personal, monthly updated "iron bank" consisting of 7.100€ which you can freely use to acquire preferred work tools and home office supplies.You will get full holidays from the beginning of your employment, no matter what time of the year you start.Full culture and sports benefits, massage benefit, and commuting and bicycle benefitsA 500-2000€ bonus for each professional certificate you completeAn extensive set of health benefits with health insurance, covering special healthcare, dental care, and psychological support, among othersWe cherish our sense of community with our yearly employee trips (we have been, e.g., to Pisa, Berlin, Vienna, Edinburgh, and Dubrovnik, as well as the skiing centers of the North), seasonal events, and weekly get-togethers and breakfasts. You're welcome to join our running club, wine tasting, movie nights, HIIT training, or board game club, among others!Our way of working is grounded in trust, openness, and mutual respect; each Nitorean brings their unique quality to the company. We value and cherish our differences and the added value this brings to our customers.About your future employerAt Nitor, we don’t just build digital solutions; we create lasting success stories in collaboration with our clients. Sustainability is at the heart of our approach, ensuring that the systems, communities, environments, and processes we develop stand the test of time. This is what we call sustainable digital development.Our 250+ experts operate across Helsinki, Tampere, and Stockholm, combining diverse talents to deliver meaningful impact. Recognized as a Great Place to Work and awarded Finland’s Most Magnetic Employer Brand (read more), we take pride in our employee-driven culture and genuine commitment to our people's growth. We don’t just work together; we grow together. Your ideas and expertise will have a real impact, shaping both Nitor’s future and your career.Our vision is clear: to be the top choice for professionals in the field, driven by the happiness and empowerment of our people and customers. As a benchmark for customer satisfaction in the IT industry, Nitor continues to achieve growth and deliver outstanding customer results (read how dedication fuels our growth).🏖Nitor's recruitment processOur recruitment process reflects our values and is a clear dialogue with four stages. You will have the possibility to meet at least four Nitoreans during the process. We offer you everything you need to know when deciding on your next workplace.1. Get to know Nitor: We map what is most important to you in your career. Our People Partner and our Principal Data Scientist / Managing Director will tell you about Nitor, our projects, and what your work at Nitor could look like.2. A technical interview: You will meet two of our consultants, who will form an understanding of the strengths and extent of your expertise. You will also gain first-hand knowledge of our projects and Nitor as an employer.3. Open questions: We double-check that you have all the answers to your possible questions. We specify your future role at Nitor and prepare the basis for your upcoming job offer.4. Presenting the offerSounds promising? Would you like to join our community of data professionals, coders, designers, and agile coaches and get to enjoy a creative and bureaucracy free working culture? Submit your application, let us know why Nitor and consulting would be an interesting next career step for you, and let's talk more!Also, please note that you will need to be authorized to work in Finland or Sweden in order to proceed in our recruitment process.Nitorilla äänesi kuullaanNitor haluaa tarjota tekijöilleen parhaan mahdollisen paikan kasvaa ja kehittyä alansa ammattilaisena. Nitorilla saat olla oma itsesi ja rakennat urapolkusi osaamisen ja kiinnostuksesi mukaan.Haastavat työtehtävät ja työkavereiden sparraus ylläpitävät oppimisen iloa. Voit osallistua myös kiinnostaviin koulutuksiin, tapahtumiin ja konferensseihin Nitorin tukemana. Halutessasi pääset käyttämään työaikaa uusien asioiden opiskeluun, Nitorin kehittämiseen organisaationa tai vaikka yleistä hyvää edistäviin projekteihin.Suomen ja Euroopan parhaimpien työpaikkojen joukkoon useana vuonna valittu Nitor on sitoutunut kehittämään kulttuuriaan jatkuvasti paremmaksi yhdessä. Läpinäkyvyys on tärkeimpiä työtämme ohjaavia tapojamme - meillä äänesi kuullaan.Lisää kysymyksiä?Laita viesti People Partner Ella Raskilalle. Hän vastaa sinua askarruttaviin kysymyksiin. Emme rekrytoi massoja, vaan yksilö kerrallaan. Niinpä jokainen rekrytointiprosessimme on myös yksilöllinen. Haluamme, että voit mutkattomasti tutustua Nitoriin ja löydät itsellesi oikean paikan.
